get.description: Find all of the orders, it will return an array with client entries containing an identifier, a boolean if the client is currently deleted and the last modified date/time in local time

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: [optional] - return a list of orders which were modified after the date/time provided

parameters.name: datetimeafter
parameters.description: [optional] - return a list of orders which are after the date/time provided (date/time of the inspection)

parameters.name: uuids
parameters.description: [optional] - comma list of IDs to return

parameters.name: agentuuid
parameters.description: [optional] - return a list of orders which are associated with this real estate agent's uuid

parameters.name: insuranceagentuuid
parameters.description: [optional] - return a list of orders which are associated with this insurance agent's uuid

parameters.name: address1

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: [ optional ] - search time to look for the order by date/time of the inspection

parameters.name: reportnumber
parameters.description: [ optional ] - search time to look for the order by reportnumber

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: [ optional ] - search time to look for the order by year

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: [ optional ] - search time to look for the order by client id (send in client's UUID/id)
